description:
Unfortunately, there is no scientific information available about a species called "Human feces pecovirus." This appears to be a made-up name, as there is no known virus with this specific designation.

Viruses that infect humans and are found in human fecal matter do exist, but they would have proper scientific names and classifications assigned by virologists and microbiologists.
